contentList.content:
[1] gives you [2]% dodge chance while dual wielding or using a two-handed weapon, and reduces the penalty of dodge fatigue by 3%. Additionally, once per turn, you have a chance, equivalent to your dodge chance, to evade a spell projectile.
Dodge fatigue reduces dodge by 13% each time an attack misses you. This fatigue is cleared at the start of your next turn.
